txt.en: Dómárr has discovered some unpleasant business in the Great Hall of Durin, and he believes that he can offer proof that Zelem-melek is extremely vulnerable.
'I should be glad to tell fellow travellers my tale of woe as I passed this way! You should heed my tale, and beware.'
Dómárr and Reinn can be found in the Great Hall of Durin.
'Here they are -- the evil Orcs of Gazatu-ru, worshipping the lord of Mordor! Be careful, now. Hide yourself well!'
Dómárr and Reinn can be found in the Great Hall of Durin.
Dómárr and Reinn can be found in the Great Hall of Durin.

'Good for Reinn! Perhaps now the Twenty-first Hall will be properly prepared to be a force to be reckoned with in Zelem-melek.\n\n'It would be a travesty to lose the footing they have gained there, simply because the foreman is blind to the dangers.'
Dómárr and Reinn can be found in the Great Hall of Durin.
'Let us return to camp, [placeholder]. This is no place to linger about, and I must gather my thoughts. Perhaps something can be done about these Orcs.'
Dómárr can be found in the Great Hall of Durin.\n\nYou should speak with Dómárr.
Instance: The Great Hall of Durin
